pkgmetadata.longdescription: Load Data From 'Yandex Direct' // Load data from 'Yandex Direct' API V5 https://yandex.ru/dev/direct/doc/dg/concepts/about- docpage into R. Provide function for load lists of campaings, ads, keywords and other objects from 'Yandex Direct' account. Also you can load statistic from API 'Reports Service' https://yandex.ru/dev/direct/doc/reports/reports-docpage. And allows keyword bids management.
